EmailTemplate.subject: NCS - List of cooking equipment for Part Two of NCS.

NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
List of cooking equiptment to bring to Part Two of NCS
Dear Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for providing us with further details about {!Contact.FirstName}’s allergy.
You told us that {!Contact.FirstName} will bring their own cooking equipment to Part Two of NCS to avoid allergic reaction.
Please bring the following items to Part Two of NCS:
Cutlery Plate Bowl Chopping board Frying pan Spatula (for the frying pan) Saucepan Colander Chopping knife
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us by calling 0333 150 2425 or emailing inclusion.support@the-challenge.org - we’ll be happy to help.
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Services - The Challenge
